description:
LIVING THE DREAM! GOLDFIELDS RESORT CRESWICK
Lifestyle seeker plus interesting options. Awaken in one magnificent setting, amongst interesting, upmarket neighbouring properties. Stroll to native bushland or high standard golf course within a swing. Enjoy a latte on the sidewalks in trendy Creswick, Daylesford or many of the historic gold towns within striking distance. Easy access to Western Freeway and/or rail to Melbourne from Ballarat (10 minutes).
*3 Bedrooms, *3 Bathrooms, *3 Living areas including theatre rooms, *4 toilets, *Well laid out kitchen, *Gas log + 2 split systems. The Design - allows the home to be locked off allowing living in the front half & accommodation at the rear which provides its own Kitchenette and private access and parking. Feel on full-time holidays while enjoying the magnificent cove

Immaculate Family Home on 1 Acre
Spacious grounds, native surrounds, a circular driveway and landscaped gardens set the scene of this handsome home in beautiful Newlyn. Elongated across the one acre(approx) allotment and covered with a well constructed tile roof and wide veranda, this home has been recently painted and carpeted to provide the ideal base for modern country living.
A freestanding wood combustion heater is an ambient introduction to the overall design, with wood like floors continuing from the dining zone through to the fully updated kitchen. Stainless steel appliances gleam with large stacked tiles forming a modern splash back matching perfectly with the colour palette throughout, while ample storage has been considered when reconfiguring the layout for the chef.
3 strategically placed split systems add a touch of the button' comfort for those chilly mornings, while the supreme makeover adds an ideal appeal for city folk.
A formal dining zone and capacious lounge allow for flexibility or adaption to suit your family's needs, with the recently refurbished bathrooms adding a little further style to the overall design.
Flooded with natural light with a smart balance of space and easy-care living, this home flaunts three good size bedrooms, a dedicated laundry and a massive alfresco zone under the wide verandas that surround the home.
Iron gates take you through to a generous yard and 15m x5.5m shed to the rear with ample power points, concrete floors separate office with 2 NBN points surrounded by vegetable gardens and features Apple, Pear, Cherry and Nut trees creating a grand scale play yard for wandering children or pets.
Approx. 35 years old, yet offering a very modern finish, this home with town water and NBN connected is just 20 minutes from Ballarat, 8 minutes from Creswick, 15 minutes from Daylesford along with a number of conveniences in and around Newlyn. Call today for extra details.

95 Four Star Road With a Five Star View
This stunning property is aptly named "Eagles View", where a resident Wedgetail Eagle is regularly seen riding the thermals along the ridgeline.
Located in beautiful Creswick North, this stunning 15 acres freehold title plus crown lease land bringing the total usable land to close to 22 acres, it comes complete with a current planning permit to build a 4 bedroom home. For those wishing to live off the grid solar power here would be ideal, while power will still be an option for you.
The views are all the way to Waubra to the West, as the creek ambles through the countryside, while to the South East the Creek winds its way towards the distant hills.
The Crown lease gives the land direct creek frontage - you can apply for water rights if you wish, or there is usually good ground water around 30 - 35 meters deep along the ridge if you would rather install a bore. A spring fed stock dam completes the available water package!

Large solid brick family home
Set on approx. 2410m2 in quiet Newlyn and located just 10 mins to Daylesford and 20min to Ballarat, the well-presented home consists of 4 large bedroom, (master with WIR and ensuite), central bathroom, full laundry and a walk in linen cupboard.
The well-appointed kitchen with stainless steel appliances, gas cooking and ample cupboard space which then flows through to a dining area. The home also offers plenty of living space with family room and terrific outdoor entertaining area.
Heating is via Wood heater, gas log fire and split system heating/cooling and the services are Mains Power, Town Water, Septic system, Bottled gas, NBN Internet. Outside features include DLUG, wood shed & 9mx6m 3 bay garden shed with roller door, 9mx6m lined studio with power and water connected, established gardens, hot house & raised vegetable beds.
The property offers a relaxed country lifestyle change and is sure to impress.

Picturesque 3ac Lifestyle, Great Shedding & Stunning Views
Set at the top of Springmount, this delightful property has picturesque views over roaming fields and amazing sunrises. The approximate 3.2 acres is ideal for those seeking the yard space for the energetic family. Such a parcel allows a kick of footy, backyard cricket or maybe a horse or two. There is a pretty dam for livestock or a spot of yabbying, while the larger toys have their own place with a five car garage with workshop and an industrial size shed measuring approximately 11 x 17m. The home also has room to spare. There are four generous bedrooms, an ensuite and robes to all. There is a formal lounge, casual living area and a huge dining room for your guests. This wondrous lifestyle is under 5 minutes to Creswick, 15 to Ballarat and just 20 minutes to Daylesford. You may never get rid of your guests.
* This information has been prepared to assist solely in the marketing of this property. While all care has been taken to ensure the information provided herein is correct, we do not take responsibility for any inaccuracies. Accordingly, all interested parties should make their own inquiries to verify the information.

Country lifestyle in beautiful Kingston
As soon as you enter Kingston’s Avenue of Honour you will fall in love with this charming town located just 10 minutes from Daylesford. There you will find this property which is full of charm and has been recently renovated.
In the main living area, you will find an open plan kitchen that flows into the living room, which is heated by either the wood fire or split system. A central bathroom with separate toilet and laundry, 2 bedrooms. Bedroom one is the larger of the two and features a walk-in robe and bedroom 2 a built-in robe. Upstairs offers a third vast loft style bedroom with a pull-down attic loft ladder which can be tucked away when not in use.
Outside is where you can explore your creative side, great sized double garage with power and cement flooring, studio, wood shed, outdoor entertainment area that offers open panoramic views of the neighbouring farmland and enough space for the kids to run abound. Work on your veggie garden or have some animals on a hobby farm. All this set on approx. 1 acre with good fencing and is on town water.
This Property has all the key features for your new country lifestyle, a delightful home which is sure to impress!
INSPECTION BY APPOINTMENT

Opportunity! 2 unique Historical Buildings, Old Bank of Australasia, Goodman's Phoenix Hotel home of the Talbot market .
Looking for a tree change. Talbot is a rural town 15 km south of Maryborough and 130 km north-west of Melbourne. These unique properties the Old Bank of Australasia and Goodman's Phoenix Hotel are joined and on consolidated titles. They have main street significance and provide an opportunity to own a piece of history. A resurgence of tourism and landowners to the township are due to the rich history, architecture and the landscape of the surrounding district, which was once a rich gold mining town.
Talbot provides a popular farmers market which sees thousands of people descend on the township each month and add to the nearby tourism of Daylesford and Avoca.
This consolidated sale not only offers 6 bedrooms, 3 living, 2 shop fronts, 4 bathrooms, 5 toilets and 2 laundries, but high ceilings, beautiful timber flooring and stunning lead lighting that creates a visual treat to beckon the continuation of its striking renovations.
Providing opportunities for individual businesses, the shop fronts have been renovated. Underpinning has been attended to and a sprinkler system is installed internally for emergency fires and many features have been returned to their former glory, but awaiting the right owner with a vision to complete the restoration.
Central heating (by bottled gas) is available and a new septic has been installed
The public pool and primary school are just seconds away and provide a huge drawcard for country family living with town benefits.
If you had a bed and breakfast or restaurant in mind, then the brick and bluestone cellar with pump is just another bonus to this already amazing sale.
Be amazed by the example of early goldfield architecture.
Situated on a large block with rear access, external shedding and amazing established trees, these properties are definitely worth an hour long inspection to realize the breadth of its purchase. Being sold as a whole only, and not separately.

ONLY 10 MINUTES TO DAYLESFORD & 20 MINUTES TO BALLARAT
Located just outside Daylesford in quiet Newlyn you could have the opportunity to build that dream home STCA & enjoy the country lifestyle.
The land size is Approx.4234m2 and comes with current planning permit.
* Town Water Available
* Power Available
* Great Views over the countryside
* Quiet Location
* Pretty Block Not Far to School, Sporting Facilities, & Playground

address: 19 St Georges Lake Road Creswick VIC 3363
description:
Over Half An Acre Allotment in Creswick
This is a rare opportunity to secure a large residential allotment with wondrous bush aspects. The mostly cleared block has a total size of 2872m2. A terrific frontage of 46.7m will grant for almost any floor plain you design to fit. The owner can of course enjoy great bush walks and the facilities of St Georges Lake. The hub of town is only a one minute drive or a five minute stroll away. This a parcel not to be missed, wanting that extra space for a large home and shedding and more.
* This information has been prepared to assist solely in the marketing of this property. While all care has been taken to ensure the information provided herein is correct, we do not take responsibility for any inaccuracies. Accordingly, all interested parties should make their own inquiries to verify the information.

Boutique Townhouse: A Cut Above!
PHONE ENQUIRY ID: 61831
Well proportioned and quality-built, this delightful townhouse is a class above the rest, privately tucked away in a premium, boutique development of only three. With beautiful leafy views stretching to Springmount from the elevated entertaining deck and a fantastic location within walking distance to town, a broad selection of dining options, popular cafes, shops, schools, buses, train station and excellent amenities at your fingertips.
A wonderful opportunity for investors seeking a rewarding addition to the portfolio, first home buyers, young families or lifestyle seekers wanting to establish themselves in a feature-rich home without compromising on space, quality or location.
Thoughtfully designed with large sun-drenched windows throughout, an excellent amount of storage internally and under-house, spacious bedrooms, living areas and front and rear outdoor areas, a double remote garage with great built-in storage and internal access, and creature comforts including gas ducted heating and split system air-conditioning.
Comprising three generous bedrooms with built-in robes - the master with ensuite access into the family bathroom with a bath, shower and separate toilet, plus a 2nd toilet and basin, and a fantastic laundry with ample storage.
Extra-large open plan living and dining adjoined by a quality kitchen with updated stainless steel electric oven, gas cooktop, range hood, a dishwasher, plenty of storage and a large island bench/breakfast bar with stylish pendants overhead.
Enjoy the views from the raised, north-facing entertaining deck - undercover and with shade blinds adding plenty of protection from the elements, overlooking a fantastic, very easy-care backyard with concrete path, stones, synthetic turf, and lovely established garden beds adding a splash of greenery - absolute outdoor enjoyment without the upkeep!

Price Reduced - Vendor Says Sell!! IDEAL Allotment in the Middle of Town!
Are you looking for the ideal allotment for convenient retirement or investment? Well look no further - right in the middle of the buzzing Township of Creswick, with all services available, we have a first-class allotment within walking distance to just about everything. Fenced on one side, and set amid other quality new homes, this 632m2 allotment provides views over the adjoining land and the Creswick Creek trickling beyond. What more could you ask for?
Whether you're retiring or just looking for your building block, this fabulous allotment would be the ideal asset. Even for astute investors, who may wish to construct a spec home? There is also a lapsed permit for two dwellings. You couldn't ask for better. Shops, public transport and superior hospital facilities add to the commuting convenience to Ballarat, or if travelling to Melbourne is your priority, then easy access to the Western Highway is only moments away. You will be shopping or dining in the heart of Ballarat city in just 15 minutes and if golf is your preferred hobby, then it's just 5 minutes to the renowned Novotel Golf Resort, which provides upmarket fairways, greens and accommodation. Don't wait, this is just ideal and priced to sell. Drive past and check out the position, then call for further information and details.

Elevated Allotment In Popular Golf Course Resort
Found in the popular RACV Goldfields Resort of Creswick, this attractive parcel is high set with lovely views and have you surrounded by kangaroos and birdlife. The block has terrific width that will take your wide frontage home. Its locale has you a one minute walk to the 1st Tee or the 19th hole for refreshments, dining and more. The owner not only can build their dream home but can enjoy the bush walks, tennis courts, BBQ facilities and the mountain bike trails. Call to today to meet the agent on site and discuss the lifestyle and design ideas of chasing natural light and more.
* This information has been prepared to assist solely in the marketing of this property. While all care has been taken to ensure the information provided herein is correct, we do not take responsibility for any inaccuracies. Accordingly, all interested parties should make their own inquiries to verify the information.

The Ultimate Oasis
Relish the unexpected spaciousness and flexibility of this modern single level home; guaranteed to leave a lasting impression.
Designed with a contemporary architectural edge with a striking red entrance, skillion roofline and a rock stacked fence, this home certainly offers an extra punch to the streetscape with a massive block adding to its appeal.
The stylish interior features an open floor plan, with four bedrooms all with built in robes (master offers massive walk in robes) along with their own individual style creating the perfect place to relax in style.
Both the family bathroom and ensuite have been splashed with vibrant colours to get your mornings started with a spark, while a further powder room is on hand to offer guests a personal zone to freshen.
A generously proportioned family room and meals area illuminated by natural light, while the designer kitchen is equipped with a stone breakfast bar, premium SS appliances and crisp high-gloss cabinetry providing plenty of storage options.
With more light streaming through, this cooking hub overlooks an elevated balcony with a sunken four person spa, along with a dry manmade feature creek & orchid, a further deck with a built in pizza oven, a massive triple garage, water tank, native landscaped gardens, a solid driveway and meandering pathways for that further garden interest.
With walking distance to school bus pick up and the Doug Lindsay Reserve, this 1730m2 allotment is just moments from a plethora of facilities and amenities, which will only add to the appeal of this impressive designer home.
Call today for further details and inspection times.

A Sporting Chance That This Is The One!
This brand new townhouse is sure to tick off your one percenters for locale if you're the sporting type. Overlooking Lindsay Park, cricket, football, soccer, netball and lawn bowls are at your front door. One could say a perfect home for retirement if you like to bowl, enjoy a cool refreshment and not have to worry about the car. The three bedroom home has all the modern comforts expected of a new dwelling. Stainless steel appliances, gas central heating and more will delight. There are earthy tones throughout and the open plan kitchen, meals & lounge open out to the decking area for the sunny afternoon BBQ. This low maintenance abode is the shortest of strolls to the train station, schools, shops and the Sunday market.
* This information has been prepared to assist solely in the marketing of this property. While all care has been taken to ensure the information provided herein is correct, we do not take responsibility for any inaccuracies. Accordingly, all interested parties should make their own inquiries to verify the information.

Filled with country charm!
Boasting an idyllic 2-acre country setting with views to the adjoining State Forest, this character filled home is only minutes’ drive from the amenities of the Creswick township and there is also easy access to Daylesford, Ballarat and Melbourne (via the Western Hwy). Abounding in country charm, the home has been fully renovated to create a move in ready home – with room for every member of the family. The floorplan comprises a master bedroom with modern ensuite and walk in robe plus three more spacious bedrooms. The kitchen will be your family chef’s delight with its quality appliances and sits adjacent to the open plan dining and living zones. The rumpus room is located to the far end of the home and its built-in cabinetry includes a drop-down bed, making it a great guest bedroom option. Some of the homes many features include polished timber floors, combustion wood heater, an open fire place, numerous split systems and of course those beautiful elevated views. Outside there is a spacious decking for outdoor living, terraced rear yard, workshop, off street parking for multiple vehicles and a large dam that is located at the rear of the property.

Historic Cottage on 76 Acres
Located 45 mins from Ballarat,half-way between Lexton and Talbot.With sealed road frontage this renovated cottage has warmth and ambience of a by-gone era. The now open plan living /family /kitchen has been renovated with a gas cook top and 900 mm electric oven. An inbuilt wood heater plus a split system give all year comfort. There are three bedrooms,and a renovated bathroom with shower over the bath. The home has polished Baltic pine flooring,adding light and character. Outside there is ample shedding also with loads of character, chicken pens, hay shed,veggie garden and fruit trees. The land is undulating grazing land with three dams, the main dam supplies water for the garden as well as stock. Built Circa 1890/1910 this cottage was once home to the miners who worked in the deep lead mines in the district. There are 5 paddocks all with shade trees and the southern boundary encompasses Caralulup Creek where the odd alluvial nugget is still found. This property is a Rare find with views of the Pyrenees ranges to the west and old volcanic ranges to the east. The land is ideal for a few sheep,cattle or horses.

Quality solid brick family home on approx. 2,468sqm with fantastic shedding.
“Hillview” Located just 10 mins to Daylesford and 20min to Ballarat Newlyn can offer the best of country living.
The well-presented home consist of 4 large bedrooms (master with ensuite and 2 walk in robes, 3 other bedrooms with BIR’s), large open modern kitchen/dining with walk in pantry and ample storage, 3 large living spaces for all your entertaining needs, central bathroom with separate shower and bath, good sized laundry, double garage with direct access to the house, and with fantastic storage through the house what more could you want.
The property is heated with a mix of wood fire for ambiance and split systems, services include town water, power and septic tank.
On the outside you have all the space you could need with a 6 x 9m 3 bay shed with concrete floor, fish pond, and rich fertile chocolate soil so you can grow vegetables, 2 x 11,000ltr tanks to do the watering and a 4.4kw solar system on the roof.
The property offers a relaxed country lifestyle change and is sure to impress.
Inspection by appointment.

ALTERNATIVE - A NATURAL LIFE ON 16 ACRES (approx.)
Take the step – rustic character of a log cabin hidden away in magnificent setting. Sustain yourself with fresh home grown foods / veggies or also a wine. Pizza out with a home built pizza oven and play petanque. The grounds offer cherry, apple and pear trees, also blackberries and raspberries and features 460 (approx.) grape vines offering a variety drop of Pinot Noir, Cab. Sauv, Chardonnay, Shiraz, Sauv Blanc (under netting). Veggie patches for fresh crisp crops. The log cabin offers verandah to front enjoying magnificent outlook.
Inside features open living, 2 bedrooms and study, separate studio with wood heating and room for a lounge / kitchenette (or ideal sleep out). Ample shedding / workshop area feature includes large wine cellar complete with wine making equipment.

Sweet Cottage To Renovate & Shedding To Enjoy
The quaint 2 bedroom cottage provides 2 separate living rooms conveniently warmed and cooled by a split system as well as offering the choice of an open fireplace should you choose. The living areas lead you into the kitchen with stone look bench tops with freestanding oven.
Located close to the well known Creswick Woollen Mill, this home presents many opportunities for the astute investor, first home buyer, investment or for retirees wanting to downsize. The 1013m2 grants shedding to the rear of the block contains parking for 2 vehicles as well as plenty of storage space and terrific work shop areas. The established gardens contain many fruit trees and give the feeling of complete privacy. Potential to subdivide STCA, your investment is solidly protected with a rental appraisal of $280p/w.

address: 30 TALBOT - MT CAMERON ROAD Talbot VIC 3371
description:
COUNTRY SETTING RURAL LAND
12 Acres of Rural living zone land on corner block with bitumen roads located between Maryborough and Clunes.
Are you looking for a block that you could build your country property, weekender or just to have for camping with the family. This could be the ideal one you have been searching for. Vendor statement available contact agents directly.

20 acres of Privacy in Central Goldfields
If you like to get away from it all, this idyllic parcel of 8.1 ha is made for you. Bordered by State Forest with plenty of privacy the property includes 2 small structures for camping, 2 waterholes, cleared and treed areas ideal for trail bike riding. Located just 5 minutes drive from Historic Talbot town centre.
For more information please contact Jo Millar 0438 081 301 or Angela Flowers 0437 456 908
